extendedInfo.description: Ever wanted to know your public IP address? You donât have to waste your time by browsing websites or searching it on Google. This little app can do that for you.Just open this app and it will instantly show your current public IP address, ISP name and the Country. This app will become really handy if you are using a VPN client in your Android device. After connecting to the VPN, most of the time itâs difficult to confirm that you are connected correctly. You can use this app to confirm your new IP address and the server location. What is my IP address is a must have app if you are using public WiFi hotspots or VPN hotspotshield.FEATURESâ¢	Shows the public IP, country, Internet service provider (ISP) name and time zone.â¢	Show the public IP location on a map.â¢	Nice and simple user interface.

reviews.comment: It provides exactly the info that it should  and no more.
reviews.author: Morton Fox
